notes: Deia, Mallorca. Iconic Belmond property in the Tramuntana mountains, celebrity favourite, strong editorial history, excellent fit for luxury lifestyle content creators
Cala Blava, Mallorca. 19th-century coastal fortress converted into ultra-exclusive resort. 156K Instagram followers. SLH member. Strong influencer content potential — dramatic clifftop architecture
Palma Old Town, Mallorca. Boutique design hotel near the Cathedral in Palma. Active on Instagram. Good fit for fashion and lifestyle content creators visiting Palma
Plaça de Cort, Palma de Mallorca. Urban boutique hotel in the heart of Palma's historic plaza. Part of Treguer Collection. Good for Palma city shoot content
Palma de Mallorca. Luxury boutique hotel in a former 19th-century convent. Part of ICON Hotels collection. Excellent boutique positioning for influencer stays

brand_name: Bikini Island & Mountain Hotel Port de Sóller
notes: Port de Sóller, Mallorca. Adults-only design hotel, 45K Instagram followers, features iconic flower power peace sign pool — one of Mallorca's most photographed hotel pools. Strong influencer track record
Port de Sóller, Mallorca. Luxury adults-only seafront hotel on the northwest coast. Part of Pure Salt Luxury Hotels collection. Beautiful sea views and pool, excellent content location
Port de Sóller, Mallorca. 17th-century fortified finca hotel with 148 rooms, gardens and pools in an idyllic bay setting. Authentic Mallorcan luxury with strong editorial credentials
Palma de Mallorca. 5-star luxury urban boutique hotel, 48K Instagram followers. Preferred Hotels & Resorts member. Stunning historic mansion with gardens, ideal for high-end fashion/lifestyle shoots

brand_name: Four Seasons Resort Mallorca at Formentor
contact_name: Claudia Martinez Melzer (Director of Public Relations)
notes: Formentor, Pollença, Mallorca. Opened 2024, historic 1929 property reimagined under Four Seasons brand. Top-tier luxury, celebrity magnet, strong PR infrastructure for influencer partnerships
Calvià near Puerto Portals, Mallorca. Opening spring 2026, 131 rooms and suites, Mediterranean waterfront. First MO in Mallorca — major new luxury property to approach for launch partnerships
Playa de Migjorn, Formentera. Boutique hotel and beach club, 23K Instagram followers. SLH member. Perfect for swimwear and lifestyle shoots in Formentera's turquoise waters
Es Arenals, Formentera. SLH member, 24K Instagram followers. Luxury boutique hotel on one of Europe's most pristine beaches. Ideal for high-end swimwear/travel content

Alaior, Menorca. Luxury agritourism hotel and boutique winery, 30K Instagram followers. SLH member. Quintessential Menorcan countryside luxury — whitewashed walls, infinity pool, vineyard. Very strong influencer fit
Alaior, Menorca. Relais & Châteaux finca hotel and spa on a historic Menorcan country estate. Authentic island luxury, perfect for editorial and luxury lifestyle content creators
Ciutadella, Menorca. 5-star luxury hotel, Relais & Châteaux member, 17K Instagram followers. One of Menorca's most prestigious addresses — historic palace hotel with Michelin dining

Son Bou area, Alaior, Menorca. Chic agroturismo boutique hotel by the Experimental Group, 71K Instagram followers. One of the coolest design hotels in the Balearics — very on-trend for influencer and model content
Talamanca Bay, Ibiza. 5-star Nobu branded hotel with private beach, infinity pool, world-class restaurant. SLH member. 100K+ Instagram presence. High-profile celebrity and influencer destination

Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza. All-suites clifftop luxury resort overlooking Es Vedrà, 85K Instagram followers. Hyatt Destination Hotels property. Jaw-dropping sea views and infinity pools — prime influencer content
Santa Eulalia del Rio, Ibiza. 5-star eco-luxury hotel, 47K Instagram followers. Award-winning sustainable luxury. Quieter, upscale side of Ibiza — great for wellness and lifestyle content creators

Interior Ibiza, near San Lorenzo. Ibiza's most prestigious rural hotel, 121K Instagram followers, dedicated PR email. Bohemian luxury in a restored 18th-century finca with spa, lush gardens and infinity pool. Essential Ibiza influencer partner
Ibiza Town. 5-star Grand Luxe hotel with Michelin restaurant, wellness spa and casino. Dedicated communications email. Conde Nast Traveler 2025 recognition. Flagship Ibiza luxury property
Stari Grad, Hvar Island, Croatia. Contemporary 5-star Relais & Châteaux resort in its own secluded bay, 32K Instagram followers. One of the most beautiful and photographed new properties in Croatia
Hvar Island, Croatia. Family-owned boutique beach resort with private pebble beach and spa. Authentic Dalmatian luxury in a secluded cove just outside Hvar town — excellent for swimwear content

Hvar Town, Croatia. Heritage boutique hotel in a restored 16th-century Ivanić family palace overlooking the marina, 12K Instagram followers. Prime location in Hvar Town, perfect for lifestyle and fashion shoots
Inside Diocletian's Palace, Split, Croatia. 4-star luxury heritage hotel in the ancient Roman palace. Historic architecture meets boutique design — ideal location for editorial content in Split
Inside Diocletian's Palace, Split, Croatia. SLH member. Intimate luxury hotel embedded in UNESCO-protected Roman ruins. Unique historical setting — extremely rare and photogenic content location
Split, Croatia. Luxury boutique hotel with stunning rooftop bar overlooking Diocletian's Palace and the Adriatic Sea. Exceptional rooftop views make it a strong content creation venue
Korčula Town, Croatia. Former 18th-century Bishop's Palace with six suites, Michelin-starred restaurant and spa. Relais & Châteaux member. One of Croatia's most exclusive addresses

Žrnovska Banja, Korčula Island, Croatia. Luxury boutique hotel on the waterfront with private beach. Contemporary design hotel on Croatia's most romantic island — great for couples and swimwear content
Lapad Bay, Dubrovnik, Croatia. Adults-only 5-star boutique hotel with seafront access, Cave Bar, and two gourmet restaurants. Unique cave bar is a standout influencer content location
Lapad Bay, Dubrovnik, Croatia. 5-star boutique hotel in a historic seaside manor, pool and gourmet restaurant with sea views. Intimate luxury alternative to large Dubrovnik resorts
Dubrovnik Old Town, Croatia. Baroque palace hotel within the city walls. One of only a handful of hotels inside Dubrovnik's walls — rare and prestigious location for editorial and luxury content
Dubrovnik Old Town, Croatia. One of only two hotels inside the Old Town walls. Rooftop restaurant Above 5 with the only Old Town rooftop terrace view. Exceptional content location inside UNESCO walls

Brsečine, near Dubrovnik, Croatia. Adults-only design B&B with magnificent views over the Elaphiti Islands. Small, design-forward property beloved by the creative travel community — excellent editorial fit
Radovići, Tivat, Montenegro. 5-star luxury resort in the new Luštica Bay marina development. Leading Hotels of the World member. Montenegro's most prestigious hotel — stunning Adriatic setting

Lake Bled, Slovenia. 5-star SLH member hotel directly on Lake Bled shore with fairy-tale island and castle views. One of the most photogenic hotel locations in Europe — iconic for travel and lifestyle content. Reopening April 2026
Pučišća, Brač Island, Croatia. 5-star heritage hotel in a restored 1467 palace in a quarry village. Unique off-the-beaten-path luxury on Brač — strong editorial and discovery content potential

Port d'Alcúdia, Mallorca. Suite-only luxury palace hotel, 61K Instagram followers on group account. Zafiro Hotels has a dedicated press room and influencer collaboration platform — active partnership programme
